metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2622 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An accessibility flaw was found in the OpenStack Workflow (mistral) service where a service log directory was improperly made world readable. A malicious system user could exploit this flaw to access sensitive information.

criterions.comment: mistral: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
